import React, { useState, useEffect, useParams, useHistory } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import axios from 'axios'; import Translate from 'react-translate-component'; import { Container, Row, Col, Nav, Form } from 'react-bootstrap'; import counterpart from 'counterpart'; import { Button, FormGroup, Input, Label } from 'reactstrap'; import en from '../lang/en'; import '../Style/Project.css'; import { withRouter } from '../../withRouter'; const FeaturedProducts = () => { const { id } = useParams(); const { push } = useHistory(); const [projects, setProjects] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { const fetch = async () => { try { const { data } = await axios.get('http://localhost:3000/projects/${id}'); setProjects(data); } catch (err) { console.error(err); } }; fetch(); }, []); return (

{projects.name}

{projects.body}


{/*

{title}
Project Number
Valid.
Please fill out this field.
Project name
Valid.
Please fill out this field.
Customer
Valid.
Please fill out this field.
Group
Members
Status
Start date
End date
*/}
); }; export default FeaturedProducts;
